headings.usage: Hero titles, Section headers, Product names

typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Manrope:wght@400;500;700&family=Playfair+Display:wght@600;700;900&display=swap');

primary.description: Classic Butcher Red - Vivid but not alarming

secondary.description: Stone White - Warm paper texture feel

accent.description: Pale Red - For highlights and subtle backgrounds

usage_rules: Use Primary Red for 'Add to Cart' and 'Checkout' actions ONLY.
Use Stone White (Secondary) for card backgrounds to differentiate from the main page background.
Text should never be pure black (#000000). Use Stone-900 (#1C1917).

buttons.primary: bg-red-600 text-white hover:bg-red-700 rounded-sm uppercase tracking-wide font-bold py-3

cards.product: bg-white border border-stone-100 rounded-sm overflow-hidden group hover:border-red-200 transition-colors
cards.category: relative overflow-hidden rounded-sm aspect-square group cursor-pointer

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle noise texture on the main background if possible, or keep it clean Stone-50.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React (already installed). Use thin strokes (1.5px) for elegance.
visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: Buttons should scale down slightly (0.98) on click. Images should zoom in slightly (1.05) on hover.

chicken.alt: Fresh raw chicken breast on wooden board

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Update tailwind.config.js to include the new color palette (Stone & Red).
2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
3. LAYOUT: Build the Home Page with a 'Hero' section (Image + CTA) followed by a 'Shop by Category' grid.
4. PRODUCTS: The Product List should be a grid of cards. Each card MUST have an 'Add to Cart' button visible.
5. CART: Implement a slide-over cart or a sticky bottom cart summary for mobile users.
6. ADMIN: The Admin Dashboard should be high-contrast (Black/White) to differentiate it from the customer view. Use a 'Control Room' grid layout.
7. TESTING: Add data-testid to all 'Add to Cart' buttons and the 'Checkout' form inputs.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
